name: Clank
description: Clanks are sentient mechanical beings built from such materials as metal, wood, stone, and clay, to resemble humanoids, animals, or even inanimate objects.

creation.name: Purposeful Design
creation.description: Decide who you were created by and for what purpose. When you generate your Experience at character creation, choose one that reflects this purpose and add **+1** to it.

name: Ribbet
description: Those of ribbet ancestry resemble anthropomorphic frogs with protruding eyes and webbed hands and feet.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: You can breathe and move underwater just as easily as on land.

features.name: Long Tongue
features.description: You can use your long, powerful tongue to grab onto things close to you. You may also mark **Stress** to unleash it as a Finesse Close weapon that does **d12** physical damage.

name: Daemon
description: Those of the Daemon ancestry are the humanoid descendants of the Fallen Gods, who possess sharp canines, pointed ears, and horns that come in a variety of styles

features.name: Fearless
features.description: When you roll with **Fear**, you may choose to mark a **stress** instead of the GM gaining **fear**

features.name: Dread Visage
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to intimidate other non-Daemon creatures.

name: Dwarf
description: Dwarves are most easily recognized as short humanoids with square features, dense musculature, and thick hair.

features.name: Increased Fortitude
features.description: When you should take physical damage, you may spend three **Hope** to only take half the damage instead.

name: Giant
description: Giants are very tall humanoids with long arms, broad stature, and one to three eyes.

creation.name: Endurance
creation.description: Gain an additional Hit Point Slot at character creation.

features.name: Reach
features.description: Any melee weapon you wield has its range increased to very close.

name: Elf
description: Elves are typically tall humanoids with pointed ears and acutely attuned senses.

features.name: Celestial Trance
features.description: During a long rest, as one of your actions, you may choose to drop into an elven trance. When you do, roll a number of **d8** equal to the **Stress** you have marked, and clear all Stredd. If any of those dice have a matching value, also clear all Hit Points.

name: Human
description: Those of human ancestry are most easily recognized by their dextrous hands, rounded ears, and bodies built for endurance.

features.name: Perseverance
features.description: Then you fail a roll that utilized one of your Experiences, you may spend a **Hope** to reroll. You must take the new result.

name: Orc
description: Orcs are most easily recognized as humanoids with square features and boar-like tusks.

features.name: Sturdy
features.description: When you should mark an armor slot, roll a **d6**. On a **5+**, you don't mark the armor slot but still reduce the incoming damage by your armor score.

name: Halfling
description: Halflings are typically smallet humanoids, with large hairy feet and prominent, rounded ears.

features.name: Little Lucky
features.description: At the beginning of each session, give everyone in your party a **Hope**. You may always reroll a **1** on your Hope Die. If you do, take the new result instead.

name: Drakona
description: Drakona resemble wingless dragons in humanoid form and possess a powerful elemental breath

features.name: Elemental Breath
features.description: Spend a **Hope** to make an Instinct Roll using your breath against an enemy or group of enemies within close range. Deal **d8** magic damage to all enemies you succeed against.

name: Katari
description: Those of katari ancestry are feline humanoids with soft fur and high, triangular ears.

features.name: Feline Instinct
features.description: On any Agility Rolls, you may mark a **Stress** to reroll your Hope Die. If you do, take the new result instead.

name: Faerie
description: Those of faerie ancestry are winged humanoid creatures with insect-like features.

features.name: Wings
features.description: Mark **Stress** to take flight until you next roll with **Fear**. While flying, your Evasion score is increased by **+2**.

features.name: Luckbender
features.description: Once per session, after you or an ally in close range makes an Action Roll, you can mark **Stress** to allow a reroll of the duality Dice. If you do, take the new result.

name: Faun
description: Those of faun ancestry resemble goats in humanoid form, with curving horns, square pupils, and cloven hooves.

features.name: Headbutt
features.description: Give the GM one **Fear** to headbutt an enemy you move into melee with. The target immediately takes **d8** direct phycial damage and can't be targeted again by this attack during the fight.

name: Galapa
description: Those of galapa ancestry resemble anthropomorphic turtles, with a large, domed shell into which the head and limbs can retract inside for defense.

features.name: Shell of Protection
features.description: The shell on your back always protects you. Add your Proficiency to your armor score.

name: Goblin
description: Those of goblin ancestry are small humanoids typically recognized by their large eyes and massive, membranous ears.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: Once per short rest, you may mark a **Stress** to make the GM reroll an attack roll. If it still hits you, reduce the incoming value by your proficiency.

name: Fungril
description: Fungrils resemble a muchroom in humanoid form, bearing the features of the fungus from which they descend.

features.name: Always Connected
features.description: To speak with other Fungril across distance to access their hivemind of information, make an Instinct roll. At character creation, describe what ritual you must perform to tap into this connection.

name: Firbolg
description: Firbolgs resemble cows in a humanoid form, typically recognized by their broad noses and long ears.

features.name: Natural Calm
features.description: Whenever you should mark a **Stress**, roll **1d6**. On a **6**, you take no **Stress**

name: Simiah
description: Simiah resemble anthropomorphic monkeys and apes, with long legs and prehensile feet.

creation.name: Nimble
creation.description: Add **+1** to evasion at character creation.

features.name: Nimble
features.description: Take advantage of Agility Rolls that involve balancing and climbing.
